scripts.convert-packs: npm run conv-actors && npm run conv-deities && npm run conv-handouts && npm run conv-items && npm run conv-npc-handouts && npm run conv-party-token && npm run conv-player-options && npm run conv-token-page && npm run conv-world-import
scripts.conv-actors: fvtt package unpack -n Actors --inputDirectory ./packs/ --outputDirectory ./packs/unpacked/_actors && fvtt package pack -n Actors --inputDirectory ./packs/unpacked/_actors --outputDirectory ./packs --nedb
scripts.conv-deities: fvtt package unpack -n Deities --inputDirectory ./packs/ --outputDirectory ./packs/unpacked/_deities && fvtt package pack -n Deities --inputDirectory ./packs/unpacked/_deities --outputDirectory ./packs --nedb
scripts.conv-handouts: fvtt package unpack -n Handouts --inputDirectory ./packs/ --outputDirectory ./packs/unpacked/_handouts && fvtt package pack -n Handouts --inputDirectory ./packs/unpacked/_handouts --outputDirectory ./packs --nedb
scripts.conv-items: fvtt package unpack -n Items --inputDirectory ./packs/ --outputDirectory ./packs/unpacked/_items && fvtt package pack -n Items --inputDirectory ./packs/unpacked/_items --outputDirectory ./packs --nedb
scripts.conv-npc-handouts: fvtt package unpack -n NPC-Handouts --inputDirectory ./packs/ --outputDirectory ./packs/unpacked/_npchandouts && fvtt package pack -n NPC-Handouts --inputDirectory ./packs/unpacked/_npchandouts --outputDirectory ./packs --nedb
scripts.conv-party-token: fvtt package unpack -n Party-Token --inputDirectory ./packs/ --outputDirectory ./packs/unpacked/_partytoken && fvtt package pack -n Party-Token --inputDirectory ./packs/unpacked/_partytoken --outputDirectory ./packs --nedb
scripts.conv-player-options: fvtt package unpack -n Player-Options --inputDirectory ./packs/ --outputDirectory ./packs/unpacked/_playeroptions && fvtt package pack -n Player-Options --inputDirectory ./packs/unpacked/_playeroptions --outputDirectory ./packs --nedb
scripts.conv-token-page: fvtt package unpack -n Token-Page --inputDirectory ./packs/ --outputDirectory ./packs/unpacked/_tokenpage && fvtt package pack -n Token-Page --inputDirectory ./packs/unpacked/_tokenpage --outputDirectory ./packs --nedb
scripts.conv-world-import: fvtt package unpack -n World-Import --inputDirectory ./packs/ --outputDirectory ./packs/unpacked/_worldimport && fvtt package pack -n World-Import --inputDirectory ./packs/unpacked/_worldimport --outputDirectory ./packs --nedb
